original_text: And he said unto the disciples, The days will come, when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man, and ye shall not see it.
korean_text: 또 제자들에게 이르시되 때가 이르리니 너희가 인자의 날 하루를 보고자 하되 보지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: And he said unto the disciples
when ye shall desire to see
one of the days of the Son of man
and ye shall not see it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 그것을 보지 못할 것이다
